momoiro-usagi was referring to pic#1 on 3-hajime.com which is this one
http://www.3-hajime.com/syouzou1.html

well, I know it is frustrating to get bits and pieces of info...I'm
happy momoiro-usagi is so cool about spending time with translation
software...the trick is I used really simple sentences

yep, it is his son
I'm sticking to momoiro-usagi because his/her translation software is
seems pretty good cuz in other places it says GRANDson
This fact must've been known for a long time as it is not even shown
in Shizuko Akama's book

its in the White Tiger Memorial Hall (expressed in other places as
White Tiger Museum) in Aizu...must check for official English name
when I have a chance.  That's cool they wanted a pic of him to be in
the museum...

[ANNOUNCEMENT] momoiro-usagi says that I can give his/her email to
people whom I trust...so anyone one here who knows Japanese and
understands basic sentence structure and would like to be our contact
with this patient person please contact me off-list we'll work out
details...just explain to momoiro that you got the contact info from
-me- because he/she is concerned about privacy and offered this option
in this 2nd message.  Ofcourse the messages to this person can be in
English but if you know Japanese then you'll know how to write your
sentences and use words which would be "clear" once the software
translates.  Kind of like the often used phrased in babelfish
translations of message posts which end with "impoliteness it is " or
"shank" (what is that supposed to mean?).

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, spiritus saitou <spiritus_saitou@y...> wrote:
(Actually, I can understand it on an evolutionary psychology basis,
but I don't think you want me to get into that here...)

***can you tell us about your theory?...I wanna hear it...wouldn't it
be hilarious if Saitou clean his armor and set it aside and other guys
are like "I'm wearing his stuff---I can't stand using Harada's stuff
LOL" yeah I'm combining PMK universe with history...
